where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION') | (('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.BUILDING_SECTION' IN TYPEOF (pdr.relating_product_definition)) OR ('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.SPACE_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF (pdr.relating_product_definition))))) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.'+ 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | SIZEOF (QUERY (sa <* USEDIN(pd, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.'+ 'SHAPE_ASPECT.OF_SHAPE') | (('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.POSITIVE_COMPONENT' IN TYPEOF (sa)) AND (sa.description = 'main')))) = 1)) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION') | (('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.BUILDING_SECTION' IN TYPEOF (pdr.relating_product_definition)) OR ('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.SPACE_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF (pdr.relating_product_definition))))) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pds <* QUERY (pd <* USEDIN (SELF, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_SHAPE' IN TYPEOF (pd)) | SIZEOF (QUERY (sa <* USEDIN (pds, 'BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT.OF_SHAPE') | ('BUILDING_ITEM_MIM.POSITIVE_COMPONENT' IN TYPEOF (sa)) AND (sa.description = 'main'))) = 1)) = 1
